Call for papers

Ends Feb 9, 2014

We are looking for anything that you think might be interesting for a wider audience and that is Scala related. Maybe you are using Scala in a novel way? Or you wrote an interesting open-source library? Have an experience report from a project you are working on? Or maybe you just want to show what can be done with the Scala language and existing Scala tools.

apply now

Scalar got a venue!

January 21, 2014

We've got a venue! Scalar will be held at Warsaw's National Library (Biblioteka Narodowa) placed at Aleja Niepodleglosci 213.

This superb spot is very spacious - we've got 344 square meters ready to accomodate the Scala people, 264 seats and marvelous acoustics. 2500W-strong sound system will make sure every chunk of Scala lore is delivered to everyone in the room. Yes, we really can't wait to see you in April!
